title: Temporary Files and Directories
description: In this lab, you will learn how to create and manage temporary files and directories in Go, which are useful for storing data that is not needed after the program exits.

meta.title: Temporary Files and Directories in Go
meta.description: Learn how to create and manage temporary files and directories in Go programming language.
meta.keywords: temporary directories, go, go labs, go playground online, file system, programming, go lab, temporary files, go practice
